alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Telfair; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 17 at 8:59AM EST until January 21 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Oconee River near Mount Vernon affecting Montgomery, Treutlen and Wheeler Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River at Abbeville affecting Wilcox, Telfair and Dodge Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding will continue. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River at Abbeville. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Moderate flooding begins. Roads to homes along the west side of the river in Abbeville become inaccessible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 14.1 feet and steady. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Sunday morning and continue falling to 10.9 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 12 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. this evening at 900 PM EST.
